Description: Basic decision tree with default parameters.
Basic random forest with default parameters.
Baseline XGBoost classifier on GPU with DMatrix & early stopping.
Tuned XGBoost classifier using RandomizedSearchCV, refitted with DMatrix.
Stacking ensemble using best DT, best RF, and best XGBoost wrapper with Logistic Regression meta-estimator.
Hyperparameters: Components: DT={'ccp_alpha': 0.0, 'criterion': 'gini', 'max_depth': 10, 'min_samples_leaf': 2, 'min_samples_split': 5}, RF={'max_depth': 18, 'min_samples_leaf': 1, 'min_samples_split': 3, 'n_estimators': 160}, XGB={'subsample': 0.9, 'reg_lambda': 1.5, 'reg_alpha': 0.1, 'n_estimators': 200, 'max_depth': 10, 'learning_rate': 0.1, 'gamma': 0.5, 'colsample_bytree': 0.9}; Final Estimator: LogisticRegression(max_iter=1000, random_state=42)
